title: How long will championship riven be up for sale?
body: My friend wanted to gift it to me but couldn't because i'm on a 15 day suspension for AP master yi. Anywho, how long will it be in the shop? Want to make sure he can gift it to me still in 13 days.

replies.body: I believe all of those skins should stick around until at least the end of Worlds, so you should have plenty of time left!
